ok ill try it now

item.title: Need help making rsps online ;/
item.dc:creator: @kbpapango kbpapango
item.description:
@kbpapango wrote:

hi!
im currently using rune evo v3
im running it fine and smooth offline… but i cant make it onlinr
here’s some things i do

1st create a host in no-ip and downloaded DUC
2nd downloaded u torrent and change the preference incoming port to 43595
3rd enabled firewall for port 43595

4th change my loader.java to
VERSION = 1.0;
public static final String CLIENT_TITLE = “supremescape”;
public static final String FRAME_TITLE = “supremescape.”+VERSION+"";
public static final String SERVER_IP = “supremescape.no-ip.org”;
public static final int SERVER_PORT = 43595;
public static final int REVISION = 718;
public static final int SUB_REVISION = 1;

** my settings. java

[i]
public static final String SERVER_NAME = “SupremeScape”;
public static int PORT_ID = 43595;

public static final String[] OWNERS = { "khenz" };
public static boolean ZOMBIE_ENABLED = true;

public static final WorldTile START_PLAYER_LOCATION = new WorldTile(2973, 3287, 0);
public static final WorldTile RESPAWN_PLAYER_LOCATION = new WorldTile(2973, 3287, 0);

public static final int droppedItemDelay = 180;
public static final double SKILL_RING_MOD = 1.2;

public static final boolean enableConsole = true;
public static boolean enableSfs = true;

public static final int CLIENT_BUILD = 718;
public static final int CUSTOM_CLIENT_BUILD = 1;[/i]

when i run it, my source port change to 43596
that why i got errors ;/

i tried to i change my port to 43596
i still i got error ;/
but i can play it offline smooth…
any one willing to help me? or help me w/ teamviewer?

Read full topic
